page.title: 16A STUBTON CHILD'S WEEKEND
page.content: My name is Peter Blackman and I live in Stubton.I like my weekends. On Saturday I get up and get ready to go to the pictures at Newark. There is a competition every week, the last one about who had the biggest teddy bear. I go with two friends and sometimes make some new friends. I either go in a car or by bus. I go to a working men's club on Saturday evening and there are singers and my mum plays bingo. There are also people who tell jokes. My dad gets the drinks for my mum and I have a drink of shandy. I meet some friends. At 11 o'clock mum, dad and I go home and I get to bed at 11.30. On a Sunday I go to a club at 12 o'clock and in the afternoon I take a dog for a walk around the village. On Sunday evening I watch television and go to bed at 9.30.
